entry.title: misguided ghosts
entry.summary:
Author: mabufudyne

Summary: He was in Gotham, no doubt about that, but…there was the chill of winter in the air, and… He couldn’t name it, not really. But it had seemed less grimey, less smokey. The air was different entirely.He pressed himself up against a wall of an entrance to the roof he was on and brought his hand up to his ear. “Oracle, come in, this is Red Robin.”His call was met with silence, static in his ear.--OR: another tim gets thrown into another universe fic where he learns to be loved :)

entry.title: (Dress)ed for the night
entry.summary:
Author: Breakinmyface

Summary: There is a gala tonight, and however much Dick has tried, all of Tim's suits just felt... wrong. He knows what he wants, the soft swish of a long skirt around his ankles is all he truly longs for.But with just a few remaining hours until the gala, he has to both still ask Bruce, and even if he agrees, surely they will not have enough time to actually get a dress that fits him perfectly?Except Tim forgets, A) he is talking to Batman, who can do anything and B) he is talking to his dad, who will do anything (if its for his kids at least).

entry.title: A Robin Adorned in Silk
entry.summary:
Author: cherubic_cherry

Summary: Tim’s mother would spend hours getting ready for a gala. She traced her lip pencil into the corner of her cupid's bow, applied a small amount of glitter into the corner of her eye to bring out their color and blush to make her cheeks rosy. When she was done, she was a modern Aphrodite. Prim and perfect and completely untouchable.Tim, on the other was flawed and broken. Just then, he was crying in the cave’s shower rooms. His legs were half-shaven, tears and snot pouring down his face, in one hand he held a makeup brush, and in the other, an eyeshadow palette.Or: Tim had always been different than everyone else. His mother noticed but ignored it. His father knew and hated him for it. He prayed that the Waynes would never find out but they always did. And maybe that’s okay.

entry.title: A Robins Guide To Repressing Resurrection
entry.summary:
Author: Meowdie

Summary: The night had always been one of Tim’s favorite things about Gotham since he was a child. The cool breeze and murky skies, how the air around him smell vaguely of cigarettes, and some new fear toxin variant that made his mind wander. It was quiet, and slow. And let Tim feel like there was a stop in time where he could just breathe. It had been an excruciating night on patrol to say the least. Two Face escaped Arkham for the third time that week, and Tim can’t help but think “what the actual fuck does Gotham have against me?” When he ends up seeing the one person he’d been avoiding for weeks. ORConner comes to find Tim after weeks of being ignored after his resurrection (First chapter is hurt/comfort version second chapter is hurt/no comfort version)

entry.title: Feather Fans
entry.summary:
Author: Ninty_five

Summary: Toree (Tim drake) has been sent by the Drakes, who are traveling, to spend his first season on the marriage market with their cousins the Waynes. Jason Todd is long missing (persumed to have died at sea), and Tim is struggling to feel comfortable in his own skin as he tries not to make a fool of his family whilst navigating possible husbands. Unfortunately, the only son of the Luthor Family, Duke Konner Luthor, has caught his attention.This follows loosely with the plot of Bridgeton cuz i've been watching it and thought this would be fun to do. Tim is trans, but not out so still goes by Toree in the first bit of this (he will go by tim and he/him later, though)--------Or: loose plot of Bridgeton. Tim is trans Daphne, Konnor is the duke, Dick is a good older brother and Jason is both overprotective and not dead.

entry.title: Papa Don't Preach
entry.summary:
Author: IDontUnderstandThatReference

Summary: When Conner died fighting Superboy Prime, he left more than just a heartbroken Tim behind.Faced with being a single teen parent, Tim has to struggle between the loss of his father, his two closest friends, and the love of his life. Then Bruce is gone, and Robin is taken from him as well.Betrayed by what remains of his family, Tim happily stays away, vowing to his son that he will never have to be exposed to the Bats. After all, they never cared for Tim; why would he think they would care about his child? So far, he's been lucky, not having run into any of the Bats despite still living in Gotham.Sure, his luck was bound to run out eventually, but he hoped his son would at least be old enough to talk when it did.Or; 5 times Tim has no choice but to introduce his son to a member of his family, +3 times he does so gladly.
